description:
Good option if everything else has too much water, it's completely dry in summer when it's not raining.

Approach

Walk up the hiking path from HÃ¼ttenwis until you cross the riverbed.

Descent

First part is more narrow but blocky, second part is rather vertical with some nice shaped pitches. Watch out on falling rocks on the last big abseil.

Exit

A few minutes down the riverbed until you cross the road.

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background
name: Huttenwistobel
